# Set the following variables before including the zypp_logic project:
#
# ZYPP_LOGIC_TARGET_PREFIX: The prefix name for all targets generated by zypp_logic
# ZYPP_LOGIC_INSTALL_CXX: true/false to enable/disable the installation of C++ include headers

ADD_SUBDIRECTORY( zypp-core )
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY( zypp-media )
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY( zypp-curl )
